channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hounded From a Beauty Pageant in South Africa, Then Crowned in Nigeria.
item.description: A South African beauty pageant contestant with Nigerian heritage was forced to withdraw from the competition after her participation fueled anti-immig...

item.title: Live Updates: Ukraine Foreign Minister Offers to Resign as Zelensky Plans Cabinet Shake-Up

item.title: Damning Final Report Into Deadly Grenfell Fire Is Released
item.description: A damning final report into Britain’s worst residential fire since World War II blamed a litany of cost-cutting, dishonest sales practices and lax reg...

item.title: Netflix Adds Disclaimer to Indian Show After Anger Over Hijacker Names
item.description: The series, based on a 1999 plane hijacking, prompted backlash on social media. Critics claimed it wrongly portrayed the Islamist hijackers as Hindus.

item.title: Who the Swing Voters Are
item.description: We analyze the voters who could decide the election.

item.title: Poltava Strike Aftermath Drains Ukraine’s Seasoned Rescuers
